item.title: Tools for Causal Inference
item.description: I read the Book of Why last year and recently in the reading group at Starling lab we read the 7 Tools of causal inference by Prof. Pearl. I was a little taken by how much I have forgotten about causal inference. So I found the need to jolt down my understanding, so I can refer to it later. This article summarized my current understanding of the tools presented in the paper, based on the paper and the book.
